params._user: address of user, create order by this user.

params._basePlatformFeeRate: Base platform fee rate, default is 0.5%

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.to: The address of the account to rescue.
params.token: The token to rescue. If 0, it is ether.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

createMarketPlace(string,bool).notice: Create market placeCaller must be owner_marketPlaceName must be unique_fixedratio is true if the market place is arbitration required

initialize(uint256,uint256).notice: Set base platform fee rate and base referral rate

rescue(address,address,uint256).notice: The caller must be the owner.The caller must be the owner.

setPauseStatus(bool).notice: The caller must be the owner.

updateMarket(string,address,uint256,uint.notice: Update market when settlement time is passedCaller must be owner

updateMarketPlaceStatus(string,uint8).notice: Update market place statusCaller must be owner

updateReferralExtraRateMap(address,uint2.notice: Update referrer extra rateCaller must be owner_extraRate + baseReferralRate <= REFERRAL_RATE_DECIMAL_SCALER

updateUserPlatformFeeRate(address,uint25.notice: Update base platform fee rateCaller must be owner
